question: Nungthang Tampak, which has become North-East (NE)'s first 100% computer literacy village, is located in which state?
explanation: The Nungthaang Tampak village in Manipur has become North-East (NE)\'s first 100% computer literacy village. The training program was organised by Mangaal Rural, an NGO working for rural development, as a part of the Digital India program and is affiliated to All India Society for Electronic and Computer Technology (AISECT). Kerala’s Chamravattom village is the India’s first 100% computer literate village.
